item.title: Roomex and IQContent get Fast 50 Awards
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: The Deloitte Fast 50 Awards were held last night in Dublin. Two friends of Web2Ireland did very well. First Roomex.com won the Deloitte Technology Rising Star Award for 2008. With growth of over 3,100% over the last 3 years, Roomex.com is fast becoming one of the most widely used booking hotel portals in Ireland and [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Deloitte Fast 50 Awards were held last night in Dublin.

Two friends of Web2Ireland did very well.

First Roomex.com won the Deloitte Technology Rising Star Award for 2008. With growth of over 3,100% over the last 3 years, Roomex.com is fast becoming one of the most widely used booking hotel portals in Ireland and Europe.

IQContent came in at Number 8 in the top 50. The team there have built a fantastic business with a focus on usability and accessibility in building great websites for an impressive range of clients.

I’ll update this post when Deloitte actually publishes the full list!

item.title: Special offer to Web2Ireland Fans
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: The Roomex guys in Dublin have kindly offered all our readers out there an extra discount on their hotel bookings. Head on over to http://web2.roomex.com/ between now and 5pm on Wednesday to avail of the offer. A big thanks to Jack Donaghy for this.
item.content:encoded: The Roomex guys in Dublin have kindly offered all our readers out there an extra discount on their hotel bookings. Head on over to http://web2.roomex.com/ between now and 5pm on Wednesday to avail of the offer. A big thanks to Jack Donaghy for this.
